title: Textile, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: wool on wool; linen
Technique: crewel wool long and short stitch embroidery on twill weave
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: scalloped scrap, wool twill backed with linen, heavily embroidered in polychrome wools in simple, stiff floral design, mostly in long and short stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 17th century.
late 17th century. Medium: wool on wool; linen
Technique: crewel wool long and short stitch embroidery on twill weave. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-60.
